affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 赋予;  头衔, 名称

sub_affix_info_list.affix_mean: 赋予;  头衔, 名称

word_group.brief_definition: 赋予人们；赋予人们资格

bilingual.source: The membership card will entitle you to a 10% discount.
bilingual.target: 会员卡将使有权利享受10%的折扣。

bilingual.source: Everyone is entitle to his own opinion.
bilingual.target: 每个人都有发表自己的观点。

bilingual.source: Your qualifications entitle you to a higher salary.
bilingual.target: 你的资格使你有权享有较高的薪水.

bilingual.source: Their qualifications entitle them to a higher salary .
bilingual.target: 他们的资格使他们可以得到较高的薪金。

bilingual.source: This ticket does not entitle you to travel first class.
bilingual.target: 这张票不能使你享有坐头等舱的资格。

bilingual.source: I know that I didn't entitle to to educate you what.
bilingual.target: 我知道我没有资格去教育你什么。

bilingual.source: Cheque which entitle the person who have it to is pay.
bilingual.target: 给支票持有人获得付款权利的支票.

bilingual.source: Till now do I also did not entitle to request you what?
bilingual.target: 到现在我也没有资格要求你什么？

bilingual.source: This ticket can entitle you to have a free meal in this hotel.
bilingual.target: 这张票可以让你在这个旅馆免费地吃一顿饭。

list.abstract: entitle（英 [ɪnˈtaɪtl]，美 [ɪnˈtaɪtl]），英语单词，动词，为给…权利；给…题名；称呼。短语搭配有be entitled to（有权）。例句为“The appearance and application of new antiepileptic drug, brought hope to the children with epilepsy to entitle them more chances for selection.（新型抗癫痫药的问世和应用，给儿童癫痫患者的治疗带来了希望和更多的选择。）”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 给…权利；给…题名；称呼；给…称号

sense_info_list.en: give someone a legal right or a just claim to receive or do something

examination_example.sentence: If "<highlight>entitled</highlight>" is the most common adjective, fairly or not, applied to millennials, the catchwords for Generation Z are practical and cautious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果说“有资格的”是千禧一代最常用的形容词，不管公平与否，那么Z一代的流行语则是务实和谨慎。

examination_example.sentence: High school graduates are <highlight>entitled</highlight> to more educational privileges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高中毕业生有权利获得更多的教育特权。

examination_example.sentence: The court, though, may want to allow room for police to cite situations where they are <highlight>entitled</highlight> to more freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，法院可能希望给警察留出空间，让他们列举自己有权获得更多自由的情况。

sense_info_list.en: give someone or something a specified title expressing their rank, office, or character

examination_example.sentence: In an essay <highlight>entitled</highlight> "Making It in America," the author relates a joke from cotton country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一篇题为《在美国制造》的文章中，作者讲述了一个来自棉花产地的笑话。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 赋予;  头衔, 名称

sub_affix_info_list.affix_mean: 赋予;  头衔, 名称

word_usage.usage: entitle表示“给……题名”时，不需要介词，直接说entitle sth.+名字，如: entitle the poem The Lemon Tree 这首诗题为《柠檬树》。

entitle sb. to (do) sth. 表示“使某人有资格获得/做某事”，如：
His services entitle him to our respect.
他的功劳他值得我们敬佩。

entitle做动词常用作被动形式，sb. be entitled to (do) sth. 表示“某人有资格获得/做某事”，如：
Everyone is entitled to his own opinion.
人人都有权持有自己的看法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 给…权利；给…题名；称呼；给…称号

sense_info_list.en: give someone or something a specified title expressing their rank, office, or character

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Entitled</highlight> the Seven Countries Study, it is considered one of the greatest studies of its kind ever performed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项名为《七国研究》的研究被认为是同类研究中最伟大的研究之一。

sense_info_list.en: give someone a legal right or a just claim to receive or do something

examination_example.sentence: You people are still withholding the money we are <highlight>entitled</highlight> to over a bizarre technical detail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你们还在因为一个奇怪的技术细节而不支付我们应得的钱。
